tool_description: Discovers hidden topics and themes within customer feedback using advanced topic modeling algorithms.

feedback_text.description: Array of preprocessed feedback text for topic discovery

algorithm.description: Topic modeling algorithm: lda, nmf, bertopic

min_doc_frequency.description: Minimum document frequency for word inclusion

max_features.description: Maximum number of features to use for modeling

error_messages: Empty feedback array: Provide at least 10 feedback entries for reliable topic modeling.
Invalid num_topics: Value must be between 2 and 50.
Invalid algorithm: Use one of [lda, nmf, bertopic].
Insufficient unique words: Feedback corpus lacks vocabulary diversity for topic modeling.
Invalid min_doc_frequency: Must be positive integer less than half of document count.
usage: Provide preprocessed feedback text and configure topic modeling parameters. The tool discovers latent topics and assigns topic probabilities to each feedback entry.

topic_keywords.description: Representative keywords for each discovered topic

topic_assignments.description: Primary topic assignment for each feedback entry

topic_distributions.description: Topic probability distributions as formatted strings

topic_coherence.description: Overall coherence score of the topic model
